actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To exempt educational institutions from user fees on permits for industrial use of specially denatured distilled spirits.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt certain academic institutions and scientific research institutions from the $250 user fee (occupational tax) in connection with permits for research uses of specially denatured distilled spirits.

titles.title: To exempt educational institutions from user fees on permits for industrial use of specially denatured distilled spirits.
